description.zh: 策略管理主要是幫助製造業與服務業高階管理者作決策。一般而言，這門課程主要協助學員們具有策略思維與整合能力。學員可在策略管理學習過程活學活用，更能融合所學應用於管理決策中。此門課也採用適當的製造業與服務業個案研討來幫助學員學習、研讀與熟悉策略管理的運作，以達成此門課的目標。授課主題包括研討策略管理的本質與整體架構，瞭解組織所處環境 ， 分析外部環境之時機和危機， 剖析內部組織之優劣勢 ， 探討企業不同層次之應對策略，整合策略的執行與治理等。
description.en: Strategic management deals with the decision making in manufacturing and service industry at the top management level. Generally, this course provides students with strategic thinking and knowledge integration. With case studies in manufacturing and service industry, this course also helps students learn, study, and understand the process of strategic management well to achieve the goals of the course. Topics in this course include the essence and whole framework of strategic management, in what circumstances an organization has been, analyses on the opportunities and threats of external environment, the strengths and weaknesses of internal organization, application strategies of companies at different levels, implantation on integration strategies and so forth.

name.en: Managing a Lean and Mean Business

description.zh: 本課程教導學生對製造業與服務業進行精實化管理的策略與技巧。課程內容包含：造成大型企業倒閉的商務環境改變與組織內的問題；科技提昇與電子化管理對企業的衝擊；精實化企業中有效及具競爭力營運管理的要素；精實化管理的發展策略與技巧。探討競爭優勢與生產服務系統模式、經營模式之關連，包括大量客製化、競爭優勢階段性、 發展競爭優勢作為、 豐富顧客價值。本課程進一步針對與精實企業體相關的重要議題，從組織、人員、技術、流程與哲理，對一家實際施行精實生產公司做全體性的架構考量。特別強調產品企畫、設計開發、試產、量產不同階段以及延伸出的供應鍊之交期、品質、成本精實思維與策略，這些橫跨精實企業體中的不同面向的整合流程需求。本課程包含外聘產業界講師演講。學生將對成功進行精實化管理企業公司所引用質化和量化的作法加以分析探討。
description.en: This course covers the strategies and techniques of managing a lean business in manufacturing and in service. The linkages between competitive advantages and production systems, competitive advantages and business models will be discussed first. Then, topics include mass customization, competitive advantage stages, developing competitive capability and maximize customer value. This course further addresses some of the important issues involved with the product or service planning, development, pilot run and implementation of Lean Enterprises.  Organization. People, technology, processes and information dimensions of an effective lean company will be addressed in a unified framework. Particular emphasis will be placed on the integration of these dimensions across the entire enterprise, including product development, production, and the extended supply chain. Process enablers for achieving enterprise integration will be addressed.

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討全球運籌管理之相關議題，其內容包括國內外全球運籌之發展、全球運籌之相關功能、全球運籌之經營與運作模式、績效衡量及其他與全球運籌相關議題，如供應鏈管理、物流、金流及通關等。此外，本課程亦將提供案例研討，以本課程理論與實務並重。
description.en: This course intends to discuss some important issues regarding global logistics management. The contents include the development of global logistics environment around the world, global logistics functions, global logistics business models, performance evaluation and other global logistics related topics, like global supply chain management and global logistic flow. Besides, this course will provide the opportunity of case study for the purpose of  emphasizing on both the theoretical and practical issues.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的是了解企業與顧客之關係，促使顧客滿意及忠誠回應而產生終身價值，進而提昇企業獲利。課程內容包括顧客關係管理的概念與本質、顧客行為、顧客資料探勘、顧客關係管理系統、顧客關係管理專案之規劃與管理、顧客關係管理的績效衡量、顧客關係管理實務研討。
description.en: The objectives of this course are to learn the relationship between corporation and customer, to increase the profit by customer lifetime value through customer satisfaction and royalty. The topics of this course includes Concepts and Context of CRM, Consumer Behavior, Customer data mining, CRM system, Planning and management of CRM projects, Performance Measurement of CRM, Customer Relationship Management :Practices.

description.zh: 商業智慧(Business Intelligence, BI)，是企業利用現代資訊技術收集、管理和分析結構化與非結構化的企業資料與資訊，創造和累積企業知識與見解，以改善企業決策品質與採取有效的企業行動，進而提升企業各方面績效。本課程將由基本現場管理(Shop Floor Control)需求談起，然後介紹製造資訊分類與收集技術（包括RFID），也將包括資料庫與資料倉儲觀念，最後介紹BI與企業資源規劃、BI與電子商務、BI與顧客關係管理等議題上。課堂中也將輔以目前市面上商用BI套裝軟體，EMBA班學生可以討論其熟悉產業之KPI，並將其專業上相關資訊在此系統上實際應用，體驗BI對企業之重要性。
description.en: Business intelligence (BI) is a business management term which refers to applications and technologies which are used to gather, provide access to, and analyze data and information about their company operations. Business intelligence systems can help companies have a more comprehensive knowledge of the factors affecting their business, such as metrics on sales, production, internal operations, and they can help companies to make better business decisions. In this course, shop floor control concepts and data collection techniques, such as RFID, will be introduced firstly. Database and data warehouse concepts will also be mentioned. Applications of BI in ERP, EC and CRM will be the important focus of this course. Students will have a chance to implement BI software based on his business-related data in this course.

name.zh: 智慧財產權與專利管理
name.en: Intellectual Property Rights and patent management

description.zh: 本課程教導學生瞭解智慧財產權與專利管理，課程的教導將朝下列方向進行：（1）智慧財產權基本觀念與實務，（2）專利資訊分析，（3）專利演化與發展，（4）創意產出，（5）專利申請與保護， (6)專利佈局，（7）專利侵權鑑定，（8）專利迴避設計，（9）案例分析。
description.en: This course teaches and coaches students Intellectual Property Rights and patent management, including topics as follows:（1）Basic knowledge and practices of Intellectual Property Rights;（2）The analysis of patent information;（3）The evolution and development for patent;（4）Innovative idea generation; （5）Application and protection of patent（6）Patent strategy（7）Patent violation，（8）Patent avoidance，（9）Cases study.

name.zh: 互動行銷與消費者行為

description.zh: 消費者會購買某項產品，絕大部分的因素不是產品本身，而是「產品被賦予的意義」讓消費者認同。這表示，「與消費者的互動」，是交易進行的基本元素。電子商務的興起，讓互動行銷的重要性大增，透過網路，企業有了一個和消費者直接對話的空間。 這帶來的是機會，也是挑戰。本課程在互動行銷方面，強調以消費者行為為出發點，用溝通觀點及體驗行銷觀點發展互動行銷策略，課程將以哈佛個案教學方式為主。
description.en: Consumer behavior on the interactive media is different with the traditional commercial environment. The topics include interactivity, and virtual experience. Topics of this course include: the economic of electronic market, consumer behavior theory, virtual community, virtual experience, quality of interactivity, interactive technology, customer service on the Internet, levels of customer relationship, transaction cost theory, Internet business model, interactive technology and customer and channel relationship. Harvard Business School case method will be used.

description.zh: 本課程主在讓學生瞭解服務業的重要性和特性，如何作好服務並使顧客滿意。內容：服務業概論、服務傳送系統、服務業地點選擇、服務品質、生產力和品質改善、預測、服務業的經營策略、個案討論、論文討論 。
description.en: Service management is to discuss how to manage service and satisfy customers. The content of the course: Service concept 、The service delivery system 、Service facility and layout、Productivity and quality improvement、Forecasting、Service quality、Service strategy、Customer satisfaction、Case study and Paper discuss .

description.zh: 本課程旨在針對電子化企業經營與管理作探討, 其中包含: 1.電子化企業概論2.經營模式3.企業再造4.企業資源管理5.中小企業電子化6. 商業電子化7.供應鏈管理8.需求鏈管理9.協同預測管理10.個案研究
description.en: The purpose of the course is to discuss the e-business management. The contents of this course will include: 1. General concept of e-business management2.The business model3. Business reengineering4.Enterprise resource planning5.Small enterprise e-business management6. Channel e-business7.Supply chain management8.Demand chain management9.Collaborative management10. Case Study.

description.zh: 介紹電子零組件之組成，特性以及其應用，使學生具有實用電路之分析模擬與設計應用之能力，內容涵蓋：1.半導体物理，2.基本主動元件(二極体，雙極性電晶体，場效電晶体)，3.放大器電路，4.邏輯(數位)電路，5.積体電路。
description.en: 1.Semiconductor physics2.Diode 3.Bipolar Junction transistor4.Field-efferct 5.Operatonal amplifier6.Digital logic circuit7.Integrated circuit

description.zh: (1)半導體二極體特性曲線; (2)半導體二極體之應用:整流器,濾波器,剪波器,箝位器,倍壓器; (3)發光二極體驅動電路; (4)齊納二極體穩壓電路; (5)雙極接合面電晶體之辨別與參數量測; (6)雙極接合面電晶體輸入及輸出特性曲線; (7)雙極接合面電晶體直流偏壓電路; (8)共射極放大電路; (9)射極隨耦電路; (10)共基極定電流源電路; (11)場效電晶體之辨別與參數量測; (12)場效電晶體轉移及輸出特性曲線; (13)場效電晶體直流偏壓電路; (14)場效電晶體放大電路; (15)整流及濾波電路; (16)偏壓分析與設計; (17)基本放大器(共射，共基，共集模式，共源，共汲，共閘等); (18)串級放大器; (19)差動放大器。
description.en: (1)The characteristic curve of PN diode; (2)The applications of PN diode : Rectifier, Filter, Clipper, Clamper, and Voltage-doubler; (3)Light Emitting Diode drivers; (4)Zener diode for voltage regulation; (5)The identification of BJT's leads and the measurement of b parameter; (6)The input and output characteristic curves of BJTs; (7)DC biasing circuits for BJTs; (8)Common-Emitter(CE) amplifiers; (9)Emitter-follower(EF) circuits; (10)Common-Base(CB) constant current sources; (11)The identification of FET's leads and the measurement of device parameters; (12)The transfer and output characteristic curves of FETs; (13)DC biasing circuits for FETs; (14)The amplifying circuits of FETs; (15)Retifier circuit and Filter; (16)Bias analysis and design; (17)Common Emitter amplifier, Common base amplifier, Common collector amplifier; (18)Differential amplifier.

description.zh: 瞭解工程系統中常用數學之原理及應用，內容包含：1.常微分方程式之特殊解法，2.傅立葉(Fourier)級數及轉換，3.矩陣代數，4.偏微分方程式，5.數值方法，6.複變函數。
description.en: 1.Special functions for solving ordinary differential   equetions2.Fourier seriesand transformation3.Matrix and linear algebra4.Partial differential equations5.Numerical methods6.Complex variables

name.zh: 微算機原理及應用實習

description.zh: 瞭解微算機之基本組織架構及應用，內容包含：1.PC之使用，2.微電腦學習機之使用，3.邏輯分析儀之使用，4.組合語言之設計與除錯，5.記憶體設計ROM/RAM，6.輸出入埠設計及程式控制，7.輸出入埠應用(鍵盤介面、LED顯示介面)，8.A/D、D/A介面設計，9.簡單PC介面卡設計(PIO及SIO)介面，單晶片之設計與應用。
description.en: The experiment covers the basic architecture and application of microcomputer.The lab. work includes:1.The usage of PC2.The usage of microcomputer training machine3.Logic analysis4.The design and debug of assembly language5.ROM/RAM design6.I/O design and control 7.A/D, D/A design8.PC interfacing design9.Single-chip microcomputer system design

description.zh: １.組合分析２.機率理論３.隨機變數４.隨機變數函數５.機率分佈６.期望值性質７.樣本分佈８.假設檢定９.線性迴歸分析１０.變異數分析
description.en: 1.Combinatonal Analysis2.Pribability Theory3.Random Variables4.Functions of Random variables5.Probability Distribution 6.Properties of Expectation  7.Sampling Distribution 8.Tests of Hypotheses9.Linear Regression Analysis10.Analysis of Variance

description.zh: 本課程之目的主要在於介紹在互動設計中所需要的程式基礎概念，將互動創意轉化為可實現的互動程式及作品，課程內容包括程式流程規劃、程序邏輯、物件程式設計、程式語言(Processing、Java、ActionScrip), 程式除錯及效能調校，並應用於互動作品創作。
description.en: This course is an attempt to introduce the basic concept of programming in interaction design. Transform our interaction idea to an interaction program and artworks. The content of this course includes: program workflow plan, program logic and sequence, object-orientation program design, program language (Processing, Java, ActionScript), program debug and performance tuning, and apply to the creation of interaction artwork.

notes: 上課教師:鄭元棓  限互動所學生修習

name.en: Planning an application on App store

description.zh: 本課程以規畫行動平台應用軟體為主，定義使用者特徵及行為。從生活中擷取創意，用市場行銷的角度規畫目標，並根據平台特性作介面設計，以結合實務的方式透過團隊分組實作的過程驗證成果。
description.en: Our class will focus on application of mobile phone. In our training, You can learning new idea from your life. We will teach you design user interface processing and understand application marketing behavior on mobile phone platform. And learning team workflow.

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於介紹使用者介面設計的相關觀念與知識，俾使同學具備使用者介面設計、原型實作與評估改善之能力。課程內容包含互動系統的使用性及其設計原則等基本概念、介面原型開發實作與評估改善流程、介面設計要領、互動形式與未來趨勢等相關內容。教學以課堂講授與介面原型實作為主要方式，並以報告與分組討論與發表為評量依據。
description.en: The objective of this course is to learn the principles of user interface design. The contents involve the introduction of usability of Interactive Systems and its guidelines, principles, and theories; interface development implementation and evaluation process, current and future interactive styles and their design issues. The teaching methods include lectures, interface prototyping, class discussion and presentation based on the course assessment of assigned project, panel discussion and individual/group presentation.

description.zh: 創意與創新產業是未來產業發展的趨勢。本課程將從知識管理的角度與觀點探討創意與創新產業知識的管理與知識資產的建置。本課程首先將定義何謂創意與創新產業，其次將探討如何導入知識管理的概念架構與技術，針對所選定的創意與創新產業案例及主題，做知識資產的創造與應用分析。並評估創意與創新產業知識管理導入的方式，與知識資產評估的方法。本課程的主要目標除提供同學知識管理的基礎理論基礎外，也將透過創意與創新產業案例及主題，提供同學發展知識管理實務的實務經驗。
description.en: Creative and innovation industries are the future trend of industrial development. This course will discuss how to manage the knowledge asset and create their values in creative and innovation industries from the perspective of knowledge management. This course will begin with the discussion on the definition of the creative and innovation industries. Then, follow the discussion on how to introduce the basic knowledge management framework and technologies to analyze, evaluate and create the values of the knowledge assets in creative and innovation industries. The main objective of this course will provide students practical experiences on the implementation of knowledge management in creative and innovation industries through various case studies in different categories.

description.zh: 本課程之目標旨在介紹人機介面設計，與人的認知行為相關之心智活動知識，俾使學生能在考量互動介面設計，具備充分之認知科學知識並加以應用，使介面之設計符合使用者的認知需求、使用上的效率與效益。課程內容包含認知學概論、認知心理與介面設計、腦神經認知、感覺訊號的知覺、注意力、記憶力、心智圖象、認知發展、問題解決、創造力以及認知與行為績效等。教學將以課堂講授以及學生分組討論與發表為主要方式，並以分組發表與期末測驗為評量依據。
description.en: This course is focused on introducing the knowledge of recognition for interactive design. Students can understand the recognition knowledge and apply it to interactive design, which can meet user recognition requirements, efficiency and effectiveness. The contents include recognition introduction, brain nerve recognition, sensor recognition, attention, memory, mental map, recognition development, problem-solution, creative ability and behavior performance. The course is preceded by means of lecturing, group discussion and presentation, and evaluated by oral presentation and final examination.

description.zh: 3D技術現在被廣泛應用到許多行業，包括娛樂，建築，工業設計和教育。本課程之目標在於學習成為一個3D藝術家或動畫師之必要技能。課堂中將會動手練習建模、貼圖、動畫設定、燈光及渲染。課程所使用之軟體為Autodesk3ds max.
description.en: 3D technology is now applied widely to a multitude of industries including entertainment, architecture, industrial design and education. The aims of this course are to learn the skills necessary to become a 3D artist and animator. Student will get hands-on training in modeling, texturing, animation, lighting and rendering in class. This course will use the application of Autodesk 3ds max.

notes: 限互動所學生修習(修課人數上限為20人)

description.zh: 本課程之目的主要在於介紹運用機電科技與互動設計之整合應用，特別針對互動裝置及互動系統中所需之輸入裝置、輸出裝置、控制裝置及機構裝置之設計。其中輸入裝置包括感測器, 攝影裝置等，輸出裝置包括馬達、LED顯示裝置等，控制裝置包括控制器，如Arduino等，機構裝置包括可動件與互動操作模式以及搭配不同材料所產生之互動效果。本課程透過學生分組構思出不同的機電與設計之整合創意，並實作出互動裝置，特別著重在跳脫原本機電科技的用途，進而賦予新的應用的可能性。
description.en: This course is an attempt to introduce the application of mechatronic technology and interactive design, especially the design of input and output, control, and mechanical devices the interactive system needs. Input device contains image sensor and camera, while output device include motor, driver, actuator, and LED display. Control device include various controllers such as Arduino. Mechanical device include portable and interactive mode and the interactions resulted from different materials. Students will be asked to come up with different mechatronics designs and create a real interactive device to differentiate from the conventional usage of mechatronic technology which would create a new possibility.

description.zh: 本課程之目的主要在於了解手機應用程式的開發流程，並以Android手機作為互動數位創作的平台與媒介，利用手機所提供的功能，來完成互動作品的創作， 課程內容包括UI介面設計, 多媒體呈現, 影像繪圖, 感應器, GPS等，以及將開發的應用程式及作品，上傳至Android Market。
description.en: This course is an attempt to introduce the development procedure of mobile application, we use Android system as a development platform for interaction digital content design and integrate different functions which mobile smart phone provides to implement the artwork. This course includes UI interface design, multimedia display, image and graphic drawing, sensor, GPS. The mobile program will be uploaded to the Android Market website.

description.zh: 本課程以建築設計的相關知識與操作手法之介紹為主，輔以大量的案例說明。
description.en: The course attempts to give an introduction to methods of architectural design from aspects of both substantive knowledge and process skills. A large number of projects will be referred as examples.

description.zh: 待補充
description.en: In this course student can understand the property of general material of buildingand the principles of building construction, we stress those knowledge related with component composition, that student can used in their design work.

description.zh: 本課程主要在教導學生探討空間組織、造型與行為模式等使學生具備整合建築設計相關知識及操件之能力，其主要授課要點如下：1.在範圍上--以各種使用性質的單棟建築為主題、2.在設計內容上--進一步探討空間組織、造型、行為特性及模式、3.在實質因素上--訓練對基地實質環境的認識及掌握，並著重材料、構造、設備、結構等系統的結合、4.在實務人才的養成上--具備整合建築設計相關專業知識及操作的能力。
description.en: The main purpose of this subject is to teach students to discuss space organization、form & behavior model；to make students be able to integrate the knowledge of architecture planning & to have the ability of practicing architecture planning.The major topics include：1、 scope：major on different usage single building2、 design content：discuss space organization、form & behavior model3、 physical factor：training students to recognize & handle physical environment, especially the integration of material, construction, structure and so on.Education：training students to have the abilities of integrating all kings of professional knowledge of architecture design & the abilities of architecture practicing.

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹台灣現行依據都市更新條例相關法令推動都市更新之相關議題，透過理論與案例介紹瞭解台灣都市更新操作機制及趨勢。
description.en: a

description.zh: 本課程主要以土地資源之「自然」、「經濟」為綜合體探討，研究其類型特徵、數量價值、調查評價、開發利用、經營管理、保護與等問題的綜合知識，尤著重都市土地問題探討。在課程內容上，根據學科發展現狀，明確和規範土地資源方面一些基本概念，如土地、土地資源、土地資源類型及土地資源的各個組成要素等，並加強了土地資源管理開發領域的一些研究內容和方法的介紹，如土地利用、土地生態設計、土地整理、土地開發、土地利用監測等內容之概論。
description.en: The course mainly focuses the comprehensive dimensions on the "Nature" and "Economics" of land resources. The type characteristics, amount and value, survey and evaluation, development and use, management, and preservation of land resources, especially problems of urban land, would be discussed.  According to the state-of-the-art trends of this discipline, the course covers some basic concepts of land resources that should be clarified and specified, including land, land resources, the types and components of land resources, and many among others. Also, the knowledge and methodologies concerning land resource development and management, such as land use, land ecological design, land reclamation, land development, and land-use monitoring, will be introduced.

description.zh: 待修正；本課程主要在教導學生對都市空間的體驗與涵構的認知，並使學生具備都市設計之基本能力與相關知識，其主要授課內容如下：1.在範圍上--主要探討都市的涵構含實質元素、自然環境及人文向度。2.在理論上--主要探討都市構成的空間基礎理論如圖地、連接及場所理論。3.在方法上--從社區居民的經營、都市設計程序的討論以至多元設計程序法之應用。4.在實務上--以台北市及高雄新市鎮為例，研討相關案例並讀設計準則之意含。
本課程期望在有限時間內對高層建築中較重要且特有的工種，如：剛構造施工、帷幕強工程、防火披覆工程、高層營建管理等加以介紹
description.en: This course purpose to introduce special and important construction method in Construction of High-Rise Building which involves Steel Structural Engineering, Curtain Wall Engineering, Fireproofing Engineering and Construction Management of High-Rise Building, etc.

The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. description.zh: 表面處理是各種製造工業不可或缺的過程，不論是傳統的工業或現代的高科技產業，表面處理都一直扮演著極重要的角色。本課程主 要是對表面處理技術在理論基礎，方法與應用等方面的講述，以期 培養學生的興趣與專業的知識。課程內容包括表面處理技術的基本 理論，前處理技術，各種表面處理的方法與相關知識，表面處理的 工業安全與衛生以及各種表面處理技術的應用等項目。
description.en: Surface treatment is an essential process at all kinds of manufacturing process, eitherin traditonal industry or in modern high-tech industry, surface treatment is alwaysplaying an very important role. The course mainly discusses the theory basis, methodand application of surface treatment technique, in order to cultivate interest andprofessional knowledge for students. The course contents include the fundamentaltheory of surface treatment, pre-treatment technique, all kinds of surface treatmentmethods and their related knowledge, the industrial safety and sanitation of surfacetreatment, and the application of surface treatment techniques.

description.zh: 粉末冶金是工業先進國家積極發展的重點科技之一，其內容涵蓋粉末製造、粉末成形固結以及燒結體的後處理等範圍，本課程即安排包括粉末製造、粉末特性與其測定、粉末混合與造粒、成形、燒結理論與實務、燒結體性質與其測定、燒結體的後處理等基礎項目。另外，再講述利用粉末冶金技術製造的材料與產品的實務應用項目等，以期讓學生能對粉末冶金技術能有基本上的認識。
description.en: Powder metallurgy is one of the most important highlighted high-tech in the developed countries, its content includes powder making,powder formation and condensing,and the final treatment of sintered body,etc.Thus, this course includes the fundamental items such as powder manufacturing, powder characteristics and its test, powder mixing and granulation, formation, sintering theory and practice, the property of sintering body and its test, the post-treatment of sintering body. Besides, it also lectures practice method like using powder metallurgy to manufacture material and product, in order to let students have basic knowledge about powder metallurgy.

description.zh: 本課程主要是講述由粉末冶金技術製造的材料與產品包括：高熔點材料、超硬質材料、超耐熱材料、燒結電接點材料、燒結機械另件燒結摩擦材料、燒結磁性材料等，以期讓學過粉末冶金課程的學生，能進一步對粉末冶金技術之應用有更多的了解。
description.en: The course mainly lecture the materials and products which are made by powdermetallurgy techniques, including high melting material, super hard material, superheat resistant material, sintered electricjoint material, sintered mechanical parts, sintered friction material, sintered magnetic material, etc., it is expected students wholearn the powder metallurgy course may have further understanding to theapplication of powder metallurgy techniques.

description.zh: 加強學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion. Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 1.電子光學簡介 2.穿透式電子顯微鏡之結構與成像原理 3.電子繞射理論 4.電子繞射圖型及缺陷分析方法 5.掃瞄式電子顯微鏡之結構與成像原理6. EDS及WDS之X光光譜分析
description.en: 1.Introduction to electron optics2. Electron Beam and Their Interaction with Specimen3. Electron Diffraction4. The Transmission Electron Microscopy (TEM)5. The Scanning Electron Microscope (SEM) 6. Chemical Analysis in the Electron Microscope

description.zh: 平面機構運動分析-解析法，空間機構運動分析-座標轉換，特殊機構分析-曲柄滑塊機構、轉向機構、萬向接頭，機構設計-運動產生器、函數產生器、路徑產生器，電腦輔助工程分析軟體之應用。
description.en: Planar Linkage Analysis by Analytical Method, Spatial Linkage Analysis by Coordinate Transformation, Special Mechanisms Analysis Including Slider-Crank, Steering Mechanism, and Universal Joint, Synthesis of Linkages for Motion Generation, Path Generation, and Function Generation, Application of CAE

name.en: Administration and management of car manufacturer

description.zh: 車廠佈置, 服務管理, 經營管理, 人事管理。
description.en: Workshop layout, service management, business management, personnel management.

description.zh: 本課程讓學生了解國內車輛產業的背景、現況和當前所面臨的課題，同時介紹車輛產業的分野，包括其架構、職掌、功能 和任務。最後論述未來國內車輛產業的動向和國際分工。
description.en: The aims of the course are to take on comprehension for learners that the background of vehicle industry, current situation developing and the issues we have been faced. Additionally, the demarcation of vehicle industry is introduced, including the structure, responsibility, function and its mission. Finally, the future trend, international uniting cooperation for domestic vehicle industry is discussed.

description.zh: 先修課程:4401011或負責教授同意力、質量與加速度，質點運動學，質點動力學，功與能，衝量與動量，剛體運動，剛體系的動力學。
description.en: Relations of Forces、Masses and Acceleration, Kinematics of Particles, Dynamics of Particles, Work and Energy, Impulses and Momentum, Kinematics of Rigid Bodies, Dynamics of Systems of Rigid Bodies.

description.zh: 本課程在闡述化學工業中以環保出發的催化劑之原理與應用。內容包括催化劑之化學結構、反應性、製備、物性鑑定、反應動力學分析。由催化循環、反應機制、催化劑結構、動力學來說明催化反應之原理。除此，並著重於介紹各催化反應應用類型：催化反應在溶液中、酵素、沸石孔洞及重要之工業固相觸媒。
description.en: This course explores the principles and applications of catalysts for the environmentally benign chemical processes. Topics include the concepts in chemical structure and reactivity of catalyst, catalyst preparation, catalyst characterization, and micro kinetic analysis of catalytic processes. The principles are illustrated with catalytic cycles, reaction mechanisms, catalyst structures, and kinetics. Additionally, we emphasis on applications of catalysis in solution, enzymes, solid and surfaces, within the molecular-scale cages of zeolites and sieves, the most important industrial catalysts.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹window 作業系統之基本操作技巧，word 文書處理軟體、Excel計算表軟體及Power Point 簡報軟體製作之 基本應用。
description.en: The course introduces the basic operating skills of the window system and the application software such as word processors (MS WORD) spreadsheet calculators (Excel) and the prestation media (Power Point ).

description.zh: 利用基因工程，生物化學、微生物學之原理，培養變種之微生物（或改良過的微生物），動、植物細胞，以製造生物活性物質（如抗生素、免疫體、酵素、毒素、激素、特殊結構之蛋白、脂肪、醣類、脂肪酸、氨基酸、生長因子、藥理活性成份、抗體等等）
description.en: By the application of genetic engineering, biochemistry and microorganisms or animal or plant cells and how to produce living organisms.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在使學生了解工業安全衛生的重要,熟悉有關知識及緊急措施,從而增加處變之因應能力.內容包括工業安全衛生組織,事故調查分析,工廠設備安全要領,工業衛生和衛生設備.
description.en: TThis course is design to introduce the student to concept of the importance of industrial safety and health with emphasis on the ability of dealing with accidents. Topics covered are organization of industrial safety , analysis of Accident ,industrial health and facilities.

description.zh: 本課程是要讓學生對微生物領域有基本的認識，內容包含微生物的細胞結構與功能；生理與代謝；基因調控與遺傳；分類與演化；致病性微生物及其致病機轉；同時亦扼要的介紹微生物在生物技術領域的應用。
description.en: The lectures describe the basic biology of microbial life. The course covers bacterial cell structure and function, metabolism and physiology, gene regulation and genetics, phylogeny and evolution, microbial diseases and pathogenic mechanisms, as well as applied topics in biotechnology.

description.zh: 本課程介紹近代電化學的分析方法。 介紹內容包含電位法、循環伏安法、安培法、光譜電化學法、旋轉環碟電極法、及其他近代電化學的分析方法。
description.en: Introduction the principles and applications of modern electroanalytical methods. Introduction the theory and application of polarography, potentiometry, cyclic voltammetry, Amperometry, spectroelectrochemistry, RRDE, and other modern electroanalytical techniques.

description.zh: 基本熱傳機構，穩態與非穩態熱傳導其包括有內部熱源之系統。內部及外部之強制及自然對流。表面及氣體間之輻射。利用因次方法及邊界層來考量熱傳。
description.en: Basic heat transfers mechanisms. Steady and unsteady conduction, including system with internal heat sources. Internal and external forced and free convection. Radiation between surfaces and in gases. Dimensional and boundary layer consideration.

description.zh: 探討邊坡穩定、滲流、壓密及現地試驗土壤力學之分析方法(1)邊坡穩定分析理論及案例應用(2)平面滲流分析(3)壓密理論及沉陷分析(4)現地試驗土壤力學分析及其應用含電子震測錐試驗、平鈑膨脹儀試驗、水力破裂錐試驗及表面波震測試驗分析等。
description.en: 英課名：Advanced soil mechanics        Probe slope stability, seepage, consolidation and         soil mechanics analysis method of present the earth         test.      （1）The theory of slope stability analysis and case         application.      （2）Plane seepage analysis.      （3）Theory of consolidation and analysis of sink.      （4）Soil mechanics analysis of present the earth test         and that application. Include electron shake measure         cone test, plane expand instruments test, hydraulic         power rupture cone test and surface wave shake         measure test analysis, etc.

name.en: Disaster Prevention Management of High Rise Buildings

description.zh: 1.高層建物之實態與傾向2.高層建物之火災災例分析3.高層建物火災時避難安全問題4.避難安全設計5.高層建物之火災安全對策6.實例研討
description.en: 1.Situation & Development of High-rise Buildings2.Analysis for High-rise Building in Fire3.Evacuation Safety on High-rise Building Fires4.Designing for Evacuation Safety5.Strategies of Fire Protection for High-rise Buildings6.Case Study

description.zh: 本課程主要係研討調查方法、穩定分析、坡地災害成因、坡地監測、防災及管理配套措施、以使同學了解山坡地工程於規劃設計及施工等階段，應如何進行減少災害和實行適當管理。
description.en: This course will focus on the site investigation ,stability analysis ,failure analysis ,in-situ monitoring ,disaster prevention  ,and risk management of natural slopes. It is designed to give students a better understanding of slope protection and slope management during various stages（such as planning，design and construction）of the slope development.

description.zh: 本課程係提供防火工程有關基礎概論、設計工學手法及實務技術等理論與應用兼重的課程，以促進學生自立研討學習能力，提高教學良性互動關係，可供職場工程實務相關防火工程之重要技能與知識。內容包括：一、現行防火安全法規與性能式防火法規二、性能式防火設計基礎概論三、防止起火及火災成長有關技術四、火災探測與滅火有關技術五、控制室內外延燒擴大有關技術六、避難疏散與逃生有關技術七、煙氣控制有關技術八、構造耐火設計有關技術
description.en: The purpose of course is to provide the fundamental theory and practical technique about the fire protection engineering, encourage the establishment of self-learning ability of students and facilitate their skill and knowledge about fire protection engineering in construction job. The course covers the following subjects:1.fire safety related regulation and performance-based code in force2.fundamental theory for performance-based design3.prevention techniques about fire initiation and growth4.techniques of fire detection and extinguishment5.control techniques about interior and exterior flame-spread6.means of evacuation and escape7.techniques of smoke control8.techniques about fire resistance design of structure

description.zh: 首先介紹我國及美日等國的防災體制、組織權責、運作機制，並比較其優缺點。接著討論防災資訊、通訊及新興科技在災害防球上的應用。介紹各類天然及人為災害的理論及特性，如地震、颱風、淹水、坡地災害、土石流、施工災害、環境污染、工業災害、全球氣候變遷等。從減災、整備、應變、復原重建四個時序來探討防災計畫緊急應變計畫標準作業程序的內容與要點。
description.en: This course first introduces the disaster prevention systems,jurisdiction and responsibility, and operation mechanism of several countries including Taiwan,Japan and the  United States of America. The application of computer information, communication and advanced technologies for disaster prevention will also be discussed. The characteristics of various natural and man-made disasters, such as earthquakes, typhoons, floods, slope failures, debris flows, contruction incidents, environmental pollution, industrial hazards, and global weather changing will be introduced. The major contents of disaster prevention plans, emergency response plans and standard operation procedures will e discussed corresponding to the disaster mitigation, preparedness, response and recovery.

description.zh: 本課程主要教授學生有關於鋼筋混凝土設計的基本原理，包含房屋之梁、版、柱、樓梯、基礎之設計及講授如何利用電腦的輔助設計，把繁瑣的設計規範、設計的計算，做更快速、更準確的分析，以期達到快速、準確、合理、經濟之設計目標。
description.en: The analysis and design (detailed design)of members in Building.Practical building code is applied to design reinforced concrete buildings mainly and steel structure buildings generally.Computer software is also used.

description.zh: 本課程內容包括頻域的Z-轉換、取樣資料系統、數位濾波器設計、數位控制器設計、及狀態空間之數位控制器設計、電腦控制等。
description.en: This course includes Z-transformation, sampled data system, digital filter design, digital control design and implementation in frequency domain and also in state space, and computer control system.

name.zh: 自動化光學精密檢測及實習

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹自動化光學精密檢測相關技術，內容包括如下：前言，精密量測概論，機器視覺原理，二維光學檢測技術及實習，三維光學檢測技術及實習，影像處理與人工智慧技術運用，智慧型量測系統及應用，系統整合之相關技術，產業相關技術應用，及結論。
description.en: This subject is arranged to introduce the principles and techniques required in Automatic Optical Inspection (AOI). The subject includes the following subtopics: introduction to precision metrology and machine vision, the measurement principles and methods used in the 2D AOI, the measurement principles and techniques used in the 3D AOI, image processing and artificial intelligence methods used in automatic inspection, intelligent measurement systems, AOI system integration and conclusion.

name.en: Special Topics on Surface Analysis for Materials

description.zh: 本課程介紹各種分析材料表面性質的方法。藉著利用光子、電子、原子、或離子與材料表面的物理或化學作用，來獲得有關材料表面的組成、結構、化學鍵結、電子組態於表面形貌等訊息。所要介紹的表面分析儀器包括；X光電子光譜儀(XPS)、歐傑電子光譜儀（AES）、低能電子繞射儀(LEED)、電子穿隧掃描儀(STM)、表面振動光譜儀(surface vibrational spectroscopy)、程式控溫脫附法(TPD)及真空技術。
description.en: The course introduces various surface analysis methods, including XPS, AES, LEED, STM, surface vibrational spectroscopy, and TPD. From the physical and chemical interaction between photons、electrons、atoms and ions with surfaces, the surface properties, including surface composition, surface structure, surface topography, electronic structure, and chemical bonding will be probed.

description.zh: 此課程之目標是講授生物化學原理，包含生物分子構形、代謝能源之製造與儲存，生物大分子之合成，基因訊息，人類生化之觀點。
description.en: The aim of this course is to introduce the principle of biochemistry, including biomolecular conformation, generation and storage of metabolic energy, biosynthesis of macromolecular precursors, genetic information, some aspects of human biochemistry.

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討調查研究法與統計學之理論基礎，課程著重其在工業設計領域內的實際運用情形。
description.en: This course is designed to study the theoretical foundation of survey and statistical reasoning that is relevant to the Industrial Design field. The course focuses on its' application in Industrial Design field.

description.zh: 產品設計專案包含研究與設計。設計專案透過工業設計的理論、方法及程序，以研究的手段形成設計決策，或以實證的方式將研究成果應用於設計實務。設計專案之設計成果必須建立在相關的研究基礎上。
description.en: This course is directed toward an approved product design project withresearch and design completed under supervision of the director. Theory andpractice in research and development dealing with the design project isreviewed in the study. Projects must represent a meaningful contribution tothe field of design base on supportive research.

description.zh: 講授設計相關學術研究的基本特質與科學方法的傳統。本課程之目標在於呈現各種研究方法的特質與限制，進而引導初學者以策略性的思考進行文獻探討並架構適當的設計研究策略，最後得以研擬具可行性的研究計劃。上述設計研究策略包括：文獻探討的方法與策略，蒐集研究資料的方法與策略，抽樣的效用與策略，及資料分析的策略等。
description.en: Lecture on theories of academic research and characteristic of science approaches in design research. This course aims to present learners with a variety of research methods and conduct individuals through the process of (1) strategic literature research, (2) constructing proper research strategies and finally (3) organize feasible research plans.

description.zh: 以親人性、創造力跨科際整合的設計思維，對設計知識與專業技能之理論及實務，從文獻探討、理論專研、實務案例等深入淺出，培養設計專業領域相關知能、洞見和體認，期能對設計相關問題解決，提出整合、創新、前瞻之具體可行方案。
description.en: In an age of rapid social, technological and cultural change, we need a new kind of design professional who is able to bring the creativity, innovation, flexibility and knowledge needed to exploit new opportunities and make things happen. Through literature review, theoretical study, and case study, this course provides design related competence and new insights, in terms of tacit knowledge, ideation, humane, and interdisciplinary thinking.

description.zh: 數位革命時代的來臨，CAD/CAE/CAM/PDM也是資訊科技的產物，相關技術的整合與應用已普遍實踐於產品開發，藉由資訊科技建立「資料一元化」的數位設計環境，打破傳統產品開發的溝通障礙與隔閡，整合跨機能的設計團隊，達成「同步工程」的理想，才能因應全球產業快速的變革。電腦輔助技術不僅是新的設計工具，其更深層的意義是產品開發體系的整體運作與管理方式也受到此一新技術影響，需有合理合適的管理架構與設計程序配合，才能有效運用，創造出其應有的價值。本課程將先探討資訊科技的原理與發展趨勢，以及分析產品設計模式與設計活動的特質，進而瞭解資訊科技對產品開發的衝擊與影響；然後以實際案例透過數位化設計技術，有效縮短產品開發時程，實現同步工程的理想。
description.en: Information technology, which brings many changes to the commercial and industrial activities, makes the digital revolution happen in the recent era. In the field of product development, information technology through computer-aided design has been very influential as well, which has not only replaced traditional tools, but also altered the design procedures. The aim of this course is to study the method of product development in a concurrent engineering. In this course, the first theme is to review information technology and product development process to comprehend the impact of CAD on product development. The other theme, by the project practice, is to implement the techniques of concurrent engineering using CAD/CAM system on product development.

name.en: Philosophy of Technological and Vocational Education

description.zh: 本課程在探究技職教育的本質、目標、歷史發展及相關哲學思潮，期培養學生發展批判思考能力分析技職教育相關議題。
description.en: This course is designed to investigate the purpose, essence, history,    and related philosophical thinking of Vocational and Technological Technical Education (VTE)；to develop students forming critical thinking to analyze the current issues in VTE.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹化學儲能裝置和儲冷系統之基礎與實務。課程內容包括：(一)儲能裝置理論與技術：電池儲能系統與模組、轉換器，各式燃料電池，如燐酸電池，質子交換電池等。(二)儲冷系統理論與技術：儲冰水式系統，各式儲冰系統如全凍結式、冰盤管式、冰泥式、動態製冰式、優態鹽及冰球式等。

The advanced PCM for thermal storage will be investigated as a hint to the students.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹應用於工業或製程上之冷凍系統的原理設計與應用。主要內容包含: 製冰、溜冰場、食品製程、水壩建造與相關土木應用、化學工業製程、以及相關冷凍節能技術。
description.en: The main objective of this course is to introduce the principles of the refrigeration systems used in industrial applications. The topics of this course include the following: 1). Ice manufacture. 2) Ice rinks. 3) Food processing. 4) Concrete dams and subsurface soils. 5) Refrigeration in the chemical industry. 6) Energy saving technology.

description.zh: 本課程為研究所熱流科學基礎課程之一，內容主要包括質量、動量與能量守恆方程式的推導，以及它們的解析與近似解，應用範圍包含非旋轉流、低雷諾數流以及高雷諾數(邊界層)流等等。
description.en: This course is one of the fundamental courses in the thermofluid sciences for graduate students. Based upon the concept of conservation, the equations of mass, momentum, and energy will be derived. This course will deal with solutions of these equations, both exact and approximate. The application of solutions includes irrotational flow, low Reynolds number flow, and high Reynolds number (boundary layer) flow, etc.

description.en: Pollution source analysis, indoor air quality standards, balance of concentration, air filtration theories and designs, building ventilation standards, bio-clean room standards, chemical filtration, discussion on ASHRAE standard 62.

description.en: This program is designed for graduate students who are interested in research and theoretical aspects of Non-woven materials. The course covers all aspects of Non-woven manufacturing methods, as well as their applications in industry. They include manufacturing methods of; fibrous web filament web wet method; physically bonded, chemically bonded or methods; lamination among the film, woven, knitted and Non-woven fabrics; use of fine and superfine particle in Non-woven industry; Printing and Finishing for Non-woven; use of Non-woven in electronics aerospace, medical materials and artificial leather..…etc.

The last two chapters deal with different application of nanostructured materials.

description.en: Stream ecological engineering method consists of restoring and protecting banks of streams, lakes, estuaries, and excavated channels against scour and erosion by using vegetative plantings, soilengineering, and structural systems. description.zh: 解釋各種合金平衡狀態之相變態過程，並以顯微組織輔助說明，由簡而繁，循序漸進，使同學容易領悟。內容包括結晶之均質孕核，非均質孕核，凝固過程之相變態，各種合金之相變態過程等，尤其是鋼鐵之相變態過程，加強同學對鋼鐵相變態之領悟能力。

description.zh: 本課程是設計給大學及研究所的理、工科學生作為研習科技法律的入門課程，內容大體上包括有專利法簡介、商標法簡介、著作權法簡介、營業秘密法簡介、網域名稱簡介、個案討論等等。在二十一世紀知識爆炸的時代中，技術創新已然成為企業競爭力不能忽視得一環，成功的企業無不就其開發出來的技術想盡辦法佈施層層法律保護網，於是，如何分析解讀競爭對手的法律保護網，如何研發出完全相容又具競爭性的產品，是現代研發單位不能不面對的一項課題，所牽涉到的層面多與科技法律相關。
description.en: The course is designed as a preliminary technology law study for college and graduate school students majoring in science and engineering . It is focused on issues related to: An introduction to Patent Law, An Introduction to Trademark Law, An introduction Copyright Law, An Introduction to Trade Secret Law, An Introduction to Domain Name and Case Discussions,etc.  In the 21st century characterized by the information explosion, technological innovation has been widely recognized as being a vital factor to the competitiveness of business. Successful companies have always tried their best to implement broad-reaching legal protection of their innovated technologies.Consequently, it appears to be essential for every R&D unit to know how to analyze the legal protection fo the competitors' products and how to develop a fully compatible and competitive product.

description.zh: 本課程目的為訓練學生獲得在太陽熱能系統與製程應用領域上高階智識理論。課程教材含蓋數種太陽熱能轉換系統用以產生電能、熱水、冷暖氣與照明等用途，主要內容包括太陽輻射幾何學、追日型太陽能聚光器、太陽能史特靈發電系統、太陽能熱水器、太陽能冷暖氣系統、太陽能海水淡化、太陽能照明系統等等章節。期使學生未來能實際應用於各種不同太陽熱能轉換系統之規劃與設計。
description.en: This course aims to give graduate student a resource on the advanced principles and application of solar thermal energy system and processes. The material presented in the course covers several technologies for the conversion of solar thermal energy to provide electricity, hot water, heating, and desalination. The course outline mainly includes analysis of solar geometry and radiation, performance of sun-tracking solar concentrating collectors, solar stirling power system, solar water heating system, solar space heating and cooling system, solar optical lighting system. It hops that the student can apply the learned knowledge to the plan and design of many types of variable solar thermal energy system in year to come.

description.zh: 太陽能是再生能源之一，太陽能又分為熱能技術轉換和電能技術轉換兩大領域。本課程介紹太陽電能技術轉換系統，包含太陽光電發電系統概論、模組及陣列、支架結構、變流器、蓄電池、直流配電、交流配電、相關儀器、網路併聯、組裝、測試、相關法令規章及實例參觀…等，使學習者有一完整太陽電能技術與應用的觀念。
description.en: Solar energy is one of renewable energy， the Solar energy has divided two field as Heating-transformation and Photovoltaic-transformation。The aim of this course to discuss include photovoltaic-introduction、module and array、structure、converter、battery、DC/AC distributed、instrument、grid-connected system、construction、commissioning、relevant-decree and visiting …etc.。Let students have a complete concept of solar electrical energy technology and application。

description.zh: 本課程係為日語入門課程。課程架構由五十音發音的學習開始、定良好的發音基礎。進一步再以句型為骨幹、將日語基本文法融合句型中、並透過日常場面會話的反復問答練習、期望培養會說、會用的簡單會話能力及聽力。予定課程學習目標：名詞、動詞的肯定、否定及時式表現、地點、移動基本句型。
description.en: This is a beginner's lesson for Japanese language study. The curriculum structure starts from 50 basic Japanese pronouncing letters. We wish our students first start with good basic pronunciation, and secondary we will put the basic word pattern as a main framework and combine elementary grammar into the pattern. Then through a repeated practice of daily life conversation, hopefully our students can achieve of using simple Japanese conversation with basic speaking and listen comprehension. Estimated learning targets: Nouns, adjectives, positive and negative of verbs, tense and moving status sentences etc.----basic Japanese word pattern.

description.zh: 人類社會中的經濟活動愈來愈錯綜，人與人之間的經濟關係也愈來愈複雜，但無非都是為求經濟問題的解決。如何將有限的資源在諸多可行的途徑中，選擇最有利、最能發揮滿足人們慾望的效果，乃是身為「經濟人」的萬物之靈所努力的目標。本課程提供學習者分析經濟現象的工具，掌握經濟發展的脈動，以便在現代經濟社會中立於不敗之地。
description.en: In human society economic activity is getting more and more complicated and economic relationship between people is also getting more and more complicated but all are to seek for the solution of economic problems. Among a number feasible ways how to choose the best way that can make best use of limited resources to satisfy people's desire shall be the goal for human being as "economic persons" making effort to fulfill. The course enables students to learn the tools for the analysis of economic situation, the way of grasping the wave of economic development in Taiwan so as to win in the modern economic society.

description.zh: 人際關係是探討對自我的了解及對人的認知，包括性格、態度、魅力、溝通、壓力、挫折和情緒等重要課題的處理；幫助同學學習與各種不同品味、信念、立場與生活方式的人作有效率的溝通，開放的表達出自己的感覺與想法，以建立良好的合作關係，從而開發潛能、爭取更好的發展機會。
description.en: Interpersonal Relationship is to discuss about self-understanding and perception of other people, including how to handle key issues related to character, attitude, attractiveness, communication, pressure, frustration and emotion.  It helps students to learn effective communication, open their minds to express personal feeling and thought, and try to communicate with other people having different tastes, convictions, standpoints and ways of living so as to establish a harmonic and cooperative relationship and furtherly to develop personal potential and strive for better opportunity of development.

description.zh: 因是在大專教藝術欣賞的課程，我在設計課程上，即考慮雖同學們不是藝術本科學生，但秉持"雖創作，但會欣賞的原則"，我的課程安排將從上古時代人類的美術創作活動進而引導解釋什麼是人類的美感經驗。讓他們明瞭東方藝術之同與不同，再介紹東西方的繪畫潮流，如西方：從文藝復興至寫實主義，印象主義，至超印象主義，東方：從漢的畫象磚開始至中國畫，書法之演進，中西繪畫之比較，內容是繁而多的。但我將用簡潔扼要的"重點教學法",寓教於樂的方式，讓同學不再懼怕"Art'，甚至可以簡單的分辨出藝術品的年代，作者，及欣賞藝術作品的要領，這是我給此門課所訂的目標。另一個教學重點是："理論和實際併重"。在每一單元中，我將設計一項簡的[自己動手做]大概祇花 20-30 分鐘讓學生體會和真正看見，明白，藝術家製造藝術品的過程。很希望能帶學生至博物院或美術館一趟，或至鶯砍參觀陶工廠。總之，一切課程計劃，乃配合學生之程度與興趣。
description.en: Because most students taking this course are not art major; therefore, I adhere to the principle of "Although not creation, appreciation will be instructed."  On course design, my class starts from the artistic creation of human beings in prehistoric time and further introduces the experience of beauty sensed by man and understand the similiar and difference of eastern and western art.  Moreover, I will introduce the fashion of priniting of eastern and western culture.  For example, the western culture: from the Renaissance to realism, impressionism and super impressionism.  Western culture: from a portrait stone of Han Dynasty to Chinese painting, the develpment of calligraphy and comparison of Chinese and western paintings. The teaching content is complicated, but I will simply it and highlight teaching way to let my students enjoy it.

description.zh: 本課程將使學生學習到氣象的一些基本知識，並應用於日常生活中。內容包括太空中的地球、天氣的要素、鋒面與風暴、世界的氣候、氣候變遷、天氣的觀測與分析、天氣預報、雲的種類、天象導覽、天氣觀察者指南等。
description.en: This course will let students learn the basic knowledge of the weather and use it to their life. The content includes the earth in the space, elements of the weather, fronts and storms, climate of the world, climate change, observing and analyzing the weather, types of clouds, field guide to the sky, weather watcher's resource guide.

description.zh: 本課程以培養學生尊重與欣賞不同族群、不同時空、不同價值觀所產生的音樂而設。藉由對音樂元素、本質的認知及介紹，欣賞各時期作曲家之代表作品，培養西方音樂的基本常識，建立音樂欣賞的專業態度。教學目標：1.提高學生音樂欣賞的素養，充實其音樂生活的內涵，2.激發學生對音樂的興趣，培育愛樂人口，增進社會祥和的原動力，3.介紹古今中外音樂名家名作，啟發學生對音樂創作的認知與敬重，4.建立學生對古典音樂、民族音樂、應用音樂及通俗音樂等不同類型音樂的正確認知與包容力，培養世界性的音樂觀。授課內容：1.概論, 2.歌樂, 3.器樂, 4.儀式音樂, 5.舞蹈音樂, 6.戲劇音樂。
description.en: This course aims to cultivate students' ability to appreciate music of different ethnic groups, different time and place, different value systems. Through the introduction of basic music elements as well as the appreciation of the masterpieces of various composers, it is hoped that students will build up basic music knowledge about music and enhance professional music appreciation potentiality in music. The goals include: 1. Elevating students' capability in music appreciation 2. Inspiring students' interest in music with a view to improving our society into a harmonious world. 3. Introducing domestic and international famous composers' pieces 4. Touring of various forms of music: classical, ethnic, applied and popular music. Contents of this course include: 1.Introduction 2. Vocal music 3. Instrumental music 4. Ritual music 5. Dance music 6. Theatre music

description.zh: 一、教學目標：幫助同學把毛筆字練好，進而培養欣賞能力。二、其教學內容包含1.鑑賞相關知識。2.名碑帖之認識3.篆刻、裱褙    之簡介4.行書、楷書之臨模與創作5.書論之研讀。三、評量則以整學期先後習作之比較出情訂定其成績。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to improve students' ability of appreciating Chinese calligraphy as well as the practice of handwriting skill. The contents include: 1. The knowledge of appreciation 2. Introduction of masterpieces. 3. Introductory studies of seal carving and traditional Chinese picture mounting. 4. Chinese calligraphy practice 5.reference materials study. Grading will be based on the improvement of students` works through all semester.

description.zh: 面對日益複雜的社會現象與社會組織，生活規範已由傳統的道德習俗，逐漸代之以法律倫理，生活在現代化的社會，有必要從認知法理、遵守法律，進而要求落實法治。俾政府施政依法而治，社會倫理得以重建，個人權益亦獲得確實的保障。本課程兼顧理論與實例的探討，包括法律的理念與概念、法律與社會生活各層面的關聯性、現行法體制的基本認識、法治生活的檢視與展望。
description.en: Facing increasingly complicated social phenomena and organization, norms of life are governed by laws instead of traditional moral customs. Living in modern society, it is necessary to have a better understanding of the law, so that people will abide by the law and further thoroughly implement the legal system to ensure that the government administration may be performed in accordance with the law. In this way, social ethic may be re-established and individual's benefit may be protected. The discussion in the course covers theory and examples, including the concept of the law, law and politic, law and society, law and life, etc.

name.en: An Introduction to Philosophy of Ecology

description.zh: 本課程將介紹分析下列基本思想：生態中心主義（內含深層生態及動物權及自然權、土地倫理、檢樸生活）、人中心主義（內含淺層生態/環境主義及環境正義、本土化及環球化等議題）、生態女性主義、荒野保護主義、生態社會主義，時間輪迴歷史觀, 綠色宗教論述 (如基督教生態思潮、佛經生態思潮、儒家與生態，原住民生態論述，以及後現代生態科學論述（內含混沌、複雜、模糊及量子力學等理論）。
description.en: Our course will critically and analytically introduce the following basic concepts: ecocentrism (covering deep ecology, rights of nature, right of animals, land ethics, and simple lifestyle), anthropocentrism (shallow ecology and environmentalism covering local and global issues ), ecofeminism, preservation of wilderness, ecosocialism, cyclic perspective of history, greening religions (eco-Christianity, eco-Buddhism, Confucianism and Ecology, indigenous ecological discourses, postmodern theories of sciences  (including chaotic theory, fuzzy theory, theory of complexity, and quantum theory).

description.zh: 本課程的目標在培養有效率的工業人才。包括生產、分配、消費財貨與勞務的各部門，無論是新進的員工或最高層的經理，如要請求效率，則定須具備本門知識。本課程分四方面：（一）、人事心理，包括工作分析，人事選用程序及方法，人事測驗原理及應用，工作考核，員工訓練，工作評價；（二）、組織社會心理，包括動機理論與管理，態度與士氣的測量，組織理論與人行為，領導行為，員工參與，意見溝通；（三）、工程心理，包括工作環境與工作效率，機械設備與工作設計，意外防止與工業安全；（四）、消費心理，包括消費行為，廣告宣傳。上課方式包含講授，討論個人習作等。
description.en: This course is designed for cultivating the effective industrial workers. Whoever he is, the person should be full of the knowledge of Industrial Psychology if only he is working and if only he wants to be an effective worker, no matter he is a new person or top management, working in industry or in business, for government or for forivate institute, The focuses of this course will be on (1)personal psychology:including job analysis, personel selection program, the principles and appliance of personnel tests, performance appraisal, personnel training training, job evaluation, (2)social psychology of the organization:including the theory and management of motivation, the measurement of attitude and morale, leadership, employee participation, communication; (3)engineering psychology:including work conditions and industrial effectiveness, machine and job design, accident prevention and insustrial safety; (4)consumer psychology:including consum behavior and advertising. description.zh: 環境保護是廿世紀的新課題，也是人類目前及未來所面臨的最大考驗。因為環境問題是超越國界的，因此環境的保護是每個人都必須瞭解的，也是每個人應盡的責任。本課程首先在了解環境與生活素質的關係，並了解環境問題的產生及其分類，再就台灣環境問題之所在分析其根源，最後了解台灣環境實施之現況後，並共同研究解決之道。
description.en: Introduction to Environmental Protection is a brand new issue of the 20th century; also, it is the biggest challenge of all human beings and our offspring. Because environmental protection is an international issue, everyone got to realize it's importance and take some action. This lesson is designed to help students understand: 1. the connection between our environment and our living condition; 2.the cause of environmental problems and their classification; 3.the cause of environmental problems in Taiwan; and 4.the solution to Taiwan's environmental problems.

description.zh: 從日語的50音、日常問候用語及自我介紹等開始學起，循序漸進學會日語會話基本語彙、句型及用法等，課程中介紹日本生活習慣、日本文化與年中行事，並採用CD等視聽輔助教材，進行聽力訓練、會話練習及日本歌謠及演歌教唱等。
description.en: This is a beginner's course for Japanese language study. The curriculum structure starts from 50 basic Japanese pronouncing letters. The aims of the courses are to increase students' ability to use the Japanese language for academic, business, and social purposes. In addition, students are introduced to relevant aspects of Japan's life and culture and prepared for work in the specific subject fields.

description.zh: 大眾傳播與人類社會的關係，正隨科技的進步而日益擴大它的影響力。根據學者研究發現，人類的思想、態度與價值觀念受大眾傳播的影響日漸加深，大傳媒介不但塑造人的思想，同時也影響人們的行為及價值；然而從傳播的功能言，大眾傳播同時具有正面與負面的社會功能，故大眾傳播的發展與過程，殊值重視與探討。本課程兼顧理論與實例的探討，包括傳播特性與要素、大眾傳播的能及效果、新聞守門人理論等，並以實例分析新聞的公正客觀性、新聞自由與國家安全、媒體與選舉等傳播爭議性問題。修習本課程可培養學生閱讀新聞的正確性，不玫人云亦云，受媒體報導所擺佈；同時亦可增強學生人際溝通的技巧與能力。
description.en: With the advancement of technology, mass communication is enlarging its influence in human society.  According to  researches, the thoughts, attitudes and value judgements of humans are deeply affected by mass communication.  The media not only shape persons' thoughts, but also have an impact on their behavior and values.  Since mass communication has positive and negative social functions at the same time, its development and process are therefore worthy of paying much attention and exploration to us.  This course includes the study of the theory and practice of mass communication, such as characteristics and elements functions and effects, as well as the theory of the news gatekeepers.  It also uses stories to analyze disputed issues, for example, news objectivism, freedom of the press and national security, and media and election.  Learning this course, students will be not only capable of cultivating the ability to read a news correctl

name.en: Analysis of the Historic Persons in Modern China

description.zh: 自國父鼓吹革命，以迄民國肇造，多少英雄豪傑活躍於歷史舞台上。對於這些時代人物的臧否、評價，實有進一步認識和了解的必要，以便在閱讀此段歷史之時，能作出正確而客觀的判斷。是以本課程擬就民國時期中，較具有關鍵且影響力較大的人物作一公正持平的介紹。此外，台灣在日據時期，亦有多位民主鬥士，不畏異族的高壓統治，竭盡所能，鼓吹新思想、倡導民主運動，其精神實在可佩，對於這些人物我們不可不知，自然亦在我們所要講授的範圍之內。
description.en: Since the revolution of Dr. Sun Yat-sen, many people have played important roles in Chinese history. They have had much influences in our country. It is essential for our students to have further knowledge about them, especiallt during the period of Japanese occupation in Taiwan. There were many people who didn't yield to Japanese control and promoted the democratic movement in Taiwan. They loved the land and tried their best to advocate new thought.In the course, we'll make detailed and accurate introductions about them. Fair understanding will make the students have objective comments about historic persons and the history of the period.

description.zh: 這e世紀時代的資訊交流是一個廣泛、多樣化與複雜的；究竟人們如何透過溝通表達意識與行為，卻變成非常重要。有效的溝通程度常視為學習溝通的指標，須視事實、竟見、感覺、嗜好和經驗進行徹底地交融與分享的結果。因此，本課程重視現代社會學習「溝通管理」的二項關鍵技術包括：有效溝通結合自我學習技巧和方法：商業知識與科技結合促成人的系統互動能力，配合多媒體傳輸工具完成學習個人與團體溝通效益。課程涵概主題:1.溝通管理定義與本質元素。2.溝通管理內涵分析。3.學習個人溝通能力。4.學習溝通程序。5.e化自我學習技巧、方法與表達能力。6.學習全球化溝通科技工具。7.團隊溝通的策略與協同戰術。8.塑造整體溝通文化。
description.en: The information exchange is wide, variety, and complicated in the e-era; how do people express their consciousness and behavior turn to become very important. Effective communication degrees usually are seen as the index of learning communication. It depends on thoroughly melting and sharing with fact, opinion, feeling, interesting and experience. Therefore, "Communication Management," in this course we emphasize on two key techniques of modern society learning including: effective communication with self-learning skill and method; Business knowledge and technology with interactive ability of human system. By using multimedia transmitting tools to complete self and group learning communication and get benefit.Course Subjects:1. Definition and essential element of Communication Management.2. Content analysis of Communication Management.3. Learn personal communication ability.4. Learn communication process.5. E-learning skill, method, and expression ability.6. Learn the technical tools

description.zh: 以視覺藝術為探討重點，研究藝術起源以及原始美術、民俗與大眾藝術分野。探究式覺元素和設計原理以及應用媒材、使用技巧，涵蓋素描、水彩、油畫、版畫、混合媒材、雕塑、建築，廣告、包裝、服裝設計、工業產品設計及攝影等。配合幻燈教學，使同學對於視覺藝術有整體性、概括性的認識，以奠定將來從事藝術鑑賞和研究創造之基礎。
description.en: The focus of this course is the exploration of visual arts.  Students will study the origin of art and the distinction among primitive art, folk and popular art. This course also provides students with visual elements, design principles, applied media material, and techniques including charcoal drawing, water-colored painting, oil painting, graphic art, compound material, sculpture, architecture, advertisement, packaging, fashion design, industrial design, and photography. Slide teaching is adopted to give students a comprehensive and general understanding on visual art in order to foster students to appreciate, study, and create art.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

name.en: Special Topics of Materials Science and Engineering

description.zh: 本課程主要針對非材料系背景之研究生開設， 對各種材料（金屬、陶瓷、高分子、複合材料）之基本原理，性質及應用，做概要性的介紹。內容包括材料之晶體結構與晶體缺陷，固體材料之原子擴散，相圖與相變化，材料製程及應用，材料之物理性質（光性質、電性質、磁性質及熱性質）.
description.en: Special topics in 1.The structure of crystalline solids. 2.Imperfections in solids. 3.Phase transformation and phase equilibrium. 4.Strengthening mechanism of materials. 5.Metal alloys 6.Ceramics 7.Polymers

description.zh: 藉由本課程讓學生了解下列智慧建築之相關事項： 1、智慧建築之發展及構成。2、自動化科技對建築物之影響與效益。3、資訊通信系統與網路技術在建築及工程上之運用。4、台灣地區智慧建築在實施過程中所面臨之問題與應注意之事項。5、智慧建築之系統整合與綜合佈線。6、智慧型建築之設施管理。 7、智慧建築標章之評估指標。8、智慧建築之規劃設計與案例說明。
description.en: To provide students with the knowledge about intelligent buildings, the following topics are taught in this course: 1.The development and composition of intelligent building 2.Influence of automation technology on buildings 3.Application of information communication system and internet technology on buildings4.Problems faced during the course of implementing intelligent building in Taiwan 5.System integration and wiring for intelligent building 6.Facilities management of intelligent building7. Evaluation Index of intelligent building8.Planning, design, and case studies of intelligent building

description.zh: 本課程主要目的是提供學生對於都市政策規劃、都市設計與方案實施等有關專業領域更深入研究之機會。專題多元而深入，諸如以下之專題皆可作為討論之主題：1.	地方發展計畫、與管理之理論與實務2.	資源規劃與管理3.	環境倫理4.	交通政策與規劃5.	土地使用規劃6.	公共設施建設7.	國外規劃比較8.	住宅政策9.	鄉村規劃10.	景觀規劃11.	綠社區12.	敷地與不動產開發管理13.	都市理論研究14.	當代規劃設計思潮與評論
description.en: The aim of the course is to provide an opportunity for in-depth study of urban specialized areas related to policy -making, urban planning and design, and implementation professional studies. The following topic areas will be offered as options for study:1.	Theories and practices in local planning, development and management2.	Resource planning and management3.	Environmental ethics4.	Transport policy and planning5.	Land use planning 6.	Public facilities construction7.	Comparative Overseas Planning8.	Housing Policy9.	Countryside Planning10.	Landscape Planning11.	Green communities12.	Site and property development13.	Urban theory research14.	Contemporary thought and commentary on planning and design

description.zh: 本課程主要進行「永續建築環境」之相關研究議題探討與分析。於瞬息萬變之環境與極富思維空間之建築研究中並不能全然按理論或法則定律判斷，亦須依實務經驗輔以基礎理論架構予以綜合評估與分析評估。探討之內容包括但不限下面之主題：『永續建築環境規劃設計』、『永續建築環境教育』和『永續能源環境規劃設計』等相關議題間之相互依存性或相關性，藉由國內外之相關案例進行深入探討與分析，期待建立個人對現今永續建築環境之瞭解與認識。
description.en: The theme of the course is "Sustainable Architecture". It aims to provide a forum to examine and discuss solution-oriented methods for implementing sustainable development, and to stimulate more ideas and useful insights regarding architecture development within the context of sustainability. In an effort to explore and map the challenges and opportunities of sustainable development, this course aims to address the various aspects of architecture & urban development in accordance with the principles of sustainability. These themes will address issues but not limit to, architectural design, ecological and social sustainability, economic and environmental sustainability, environmentalism.

description.zh: 空調設計基礎、空調冷暖負載計算、空氣線圖應用分析、主要設備規範擬定、空調系統規劃與設備選用分析、風管工程設計、水配管工程設計、設備配置與裝設工程、材料與成本分析、節約省能規劃設計。
description.en: Fundamentals of HVAC system design, cooling/ heating load estimation, analysis of applied psychometrics charts, schematic design of HVAC system, main equipment selection, main equipment specification, air duct & water piping system design, equipments layout & installation, materials & cost analysis. HVAC's energy saving & energy efficient planning.

description.zh: 研究生透過個別化的學習方式就其興趣對技職教育課程的設計領域，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of current issues, theories, and research in curriculum and instruction. An individualized study program is planned for graduate students to develop the skills and research and guided by a professor.

description.zh: 提煉冶金學係講授各種金屬之提煉方法，內容包括礦石及各種原料之預備處理，火法冶煉─包括冶煉之化學原理，火法精煉、熔劑、爐渣、冰渣（matte） 、黃渣（speiss）等；濕法冶煉─包括溶濾、固液分離、淨液及金屬之採取等；電化冶煉─包括電解製煉之原理、電解精煉、電解採取及熔融鹽電解等；最後講述各種主要金屬之提煉方法。
description.en: Extractive metallurgy lectures each kind of means to extrate metals.The course contents include:1. Preparing treatment of minerals and all kinds of raw material,2. Dry smelting, includingthe chemical theory of smelting, dry refining, flux, slag,          matte, speiss, etc..3.Wet process smelting, including solution filtering, the separation of solid and liquid,  pure liquid, and the extraction of metal, etc..4.Electrochemical smelting, including the theory of electrowinning, electrolytic  refining, electrolytic extraction and molten salt electrolysis.5.All kinds of extractive means of the major metals.

description.zh: 1.高速PCB佈線設計的流程與基本原理 2.高速PCB的阻抗特性與反射現象 3.傳輸線的串音現象 4.電源與接線佈線技術 5.高速PCB中穿孔、連接器與IC封裝的探討 6.輸出入緩衝器資訊規格模型 7.高速PCB的量測技術 8.案例說明
description.en: 1.Flow and Fundamentals of High-Speed PCB Layout Design 2.Impedance Characteristic and Reflections in High-Speed PCB 3. Crosstalk in High-Speed PCB 4.Layout Technology of Power and Connection Lines 5.Discussion of Vias, Connectors, and Packages in High-Speed PCB 6.IBIS (I/O Buffer Information Specification) model 7.Measurement Technology of High-Speed PCB 8. Case Study

description.zh: (1)資料庫系統簡介，(2)關聯式與實體關係資料模型，(3)資料表正規化，(4)結構化查詢語言，(5)交易管理與並時控制(6)分散式資料庫管理系統(7)物件導向式資料庫(8)電子商務中之資料庫(9)資料庫管理(10)網路式資料庫專題－規劃與實作。
description.en: (1)Introduction to database systems,(2)Relational and E-R database models,(3)Normalization of database tables,(4)SQL (Structure Query Language),(5)Transaction management and concurrence control,(6)Distributed database management systems,(7)Object oriented databases,(8)Databases in electronic commerce,(9)Database Administration,(10)Web-based database project-design and implementation.

description.zh: 模內塗裝(IMD)技術是把塗裝薄膜(decorative film)預置在模具型腔(cavity)內，接著再將熔膠射入型腔內薄膜的內側，即可生產最後完成的零件且在零件表面覆上塗裝薄膜上的圖案。此製程廣泛應用在3C產品，對於增進產品外觀的表面塗裝，提供降低成本有效的方法，因為不需要作二次印刷。然而此一製程需要考慮額外的設備成本、塗裝薄膜材料生產、薄膜精確定位、與模具設計等。這門課對於機械系學生將來要從事產品開發、製程設計是一門非常重要的課程。
description.en: In-mold decoration (IMD) comprises insertion of a film or foil into the cavity, followed by injection of polymer melts on the inner side of the insert to produce a part with the final finish defined by the decorative film/foil. This process is used to produce 3C product, and provides a cost-effective way of surface decoration that enhances the appearance of product, because no post treatment is needed. However, this process must consider the extra additional equipment cost, decorative film material, film positioning, and mold design. This course is very important for a mechanical department student who works about product development and manufacturing process design in the future.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。物質熱力學特性、改變能量形式之基本原理、熱力學第一及第二定律、可逆性與可用性、動力循環、冷凍循環、混合氣、化學反應。
description.en: Prerequisite: Consent of InstructorThermodynamic Properties of Substance, Energy Forms, The First Law Thermodynamics, The Second Law of Thermodynamics, Irreversibility & Availability, Power Cycle, Refrigeration Systems, Mixtures, and Chemical Reactions.

description.zh: 策略管理主要是幫助製造業與服務業高階管理者作決策。一般而言，這門課程主要協助學員們具有策略思維與整合能力。學員可在策略管理學習過程活學活用，更能融合所學應用於管理決策中。此門課也採用適當的製造業與服務業個案研討來幫助學員學習、研讀與熟悉策略管理的運作，以達成此門課的目標。授課主題包括研討策略管理的本質與整體架構，瞭解組織所處環境 ， 分析外部環境之時機和危機， 剖析內部組織之優劣勢 ， 探討企業不同層次之應對策略，整合策略的執行與治理等。
description.en: Strategic management deals with the decision making in manufacturing and service industry at the top management level. Generally, this course provides students with strategic thinking and knowledge integration. With case studies in manufacturing and service industry, this course also helps students learn, study, and understand the process of strategic management well to achieve the goals of the course. Topics in this course include the essence and whole framework of strategic management, in what circumstances an organization has been, analyses on the opportunities and threats of external environment, the strengths and weaknesses of internal organization, application strategies of companies at different levels, implantation on integration strategies and so forth.

name.en: Managing a Lean and Mean Business

description.zh: 本課程教導學生對製造業與服務業進行精實化管理的策略與技巧。課程內容包含：造成大型企業倒閉的商務環境改變與組織內的問題；科技提昇與電子化管理對企業的衝擊；精實化企業中有效及具競爭力營運管理的要素；精實化管理的發展策略與技巧。探討競爭優勢與生產服務系統模式、經營模式之關連，包括大量客製化、競爭優勢階段性、 發展競爭優勢作為、 豐富顧客價值。本課程進一步針對與精實企業體相關的重要議題，從組織、人員、技術、流程與哲理，對一家實際施行精實生產公司做全體性的架構考量。特別強調產品企畫、設計開發、試產、量產不同階段以及延伸出的供應鍊之交期、品質、成本精實思維與策略，這些橫跨精實企業體中的不同面向的整合流程需求。本課程包含外聘產業界講師演講。學生將對成功進行精實化管理企業公司所引用質化和量化的作法加以分析探討。
description.en: This course covers the strategies and techniques of managing a lean business in manufacturing and in service. The linkages between competitive advantages and production systems, competitive advantages and business models will be discussed first. Then, topics include mass customization, competitive advantage stages, developing competitive capability and maximize customer value. This course further addresses some of the important issues involved with the product or service planning, development, pilot run and implementation of Lean Enterprises.  Organization. People, technology, processes and information dimensions of an effective lean company will be addressed in a unified framework. Particular emphasis will be placed on the integration of these dimensions across the entire enterprise, including product development, production, and the extended supply chain. Process enablers for achieving enterprise integration will be addressed.

description.zh: 本課程針對固體廢棄物的來源及基本性質，分析並介紹各種固體廢棄物再生的技術與方法實例。
description.en: This class include the discussion of the origin of the solid waste and its basic physical and chemical properties that related to its recovery, recycling and reutilization.  The recovery methods and the follow-up process to recycle the solid waste will also be discussed.  Several practical case study will be included.

description.zh: 本課程針對不同應用主題，諸如人事、財務、物料安全、品質、進度、環保等進行管理科學之介紹，並進行應用研究探討，此外有關作業研究、系統模擬等分析方法亦將於課程中詳加介紹。
description.en: This cause will introduce the management science and application of personnel, finance, safety, material, quality,schedule and environmental protection. Meanwhile,the analysis methods of activity research and system simulation will also be dicussed.

name.en: Design and Analysis of Computer Algorithms

description.zh: 本課程介紹電腦科學中演算法的原理、分析與設計策略，使學生了解各種演算法的設計，訓練如何分析解決實際的問題，以便學生可以設計有效率的電腦演算法程式，進而了解問題的難易，增加實作演算法能力。課程內容包括學習分析一個演算法的複雜度與界定一個問題難度的下界，並完整介紹整套NP-completeness計算理論。其中關於解決問題所使用的有效技巧，課程中將介紹一般常用的「貪婪法」、「各個擊破法」、「樹狀搜尋法」、「修剪與搜尋」、與「動態規劃法」及其它主題。同時課程中也將簡介演算法新的發展方向，包括「近似演算法」、「攤還分析」、「隨機演算法」、「線上演算法」等概念。最後並透過相關論文的研讀及討論，以了解近代演算法的最新發展趨勢。
description.en: The course includes: Mathematical background、Basic analysis techniques、Computational complexities、Worst case analysis and average case analysis、Basic Design Paradigms、Divide and conquer、Greedy methods、Dynamic programming、Probabilistic algorithms、Computational Complexity、Linear reduction of problems、NP-completeness。

description.zh: 微加工程序含MUMPS，打樣、沉積、蝕刻；設計工具含MEMCAD, Matlab, EM software, and Ansys 等；應用例含壓力感測器、加速度計、探針卡、微波元件、生物晶片等；最後介紹封裝與測試技術。
description.en: 1. Introductions of Microsystem 2. Micromachining Processes include MUMPS, Pattern, Deposition, Etching 3. Design Tool include MEMCAD, Matlab, EM software, and Ansys 4.Applications include Pressure sensor, Accelerometer, …,etc, -probe card and other, RFMEMS, BioMEMS 5.Packaging and testing.

name.en: Introduction to Thin Film Science and Engineering

description.zh: 薄膜材料科學，真空科學與技術，薄膜蒸鍍製程，放電、電漿、離子與表面作用，物理氣相沈積，化學氣相沈積，基材表面與薄膜成核，薄膜結構，薄膜性質測試，薄膜之相互擴散、反應與轉換，薄膜之機械性質。
description.en: 1. Thin film materials science2. Vacuum science and technology 3. Thin film evaporation processes4. Discharge, plasma, and ion-surface interaction5. Plasma and ion beam processing of thin films6. Chemical vapor deposition7. Substrate surfaces and thin film nucleation8. Film structure9. Characterization of thin films and surface10. Interdiffusion, reactions, and transformations in thin films11. Mechanical properties of thin films

name.zh: 獨立研究--教育發展策略

description.zh: 研究生透過個別化的學習方式，就其興趣對技職教育教學發展策略，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of current issues, theories, and research in education development strategy. An individualized study program is planned for graduate students to develop the skills and research in education development strategy and guided by a professor.

description.zh: 面對地球資源逐漸枯竭的當下, 投入大量生產物量的建築興建模式必須有所變革, 才能因應減低環境負荷的需求。目前建築資源能否有效地再利用的課題在各先進國家受到相當多的矚目。故本課程以介紹海外各種再利用的案例手法為出發點, 並配合台灣地區國情探討建築再利用的可能性與面臨課題。專題討論內容■ 建築再利用之導論與定義   ■ 建築再利用的主要理論與手法   ■ 歐洲及日本的既有地區性集合住宅群的再生實例探討           ■ 建築填充體的更新         ■ 建物內的隔間改造與擴充, 建築                               主體的增建與減建               ■ 外部裝修的保存與再利用   ■ 建築資材的他用途轉用         ■ 建築再利用與都市更新     ■ 建築再利用於台灣面臨的多面向課題(法令與市場)
description.en: The scope of this curriculum encompasses the theories of the management of building projects, including:1. Introduction(The definition of Reuse, Reduce and Recycle).2. Main methodologies and evaluating tools of building-reuse.3. Case study: Mass housing renewal in European countries & Japan.4.Renewal operation of infill-based building components: Case study on Partitions, kitchens& Sanitary spaces5. Relation between Building renewal and urban tissue.

name.zh: 文化創意產業知識管理
name.en: Knowledge Management for Cultural Creative Industries

description.zh: 文化創意產業的發展是目前創新產業發展的趨勢。本課程將從知識管理的角度與觀點探討文化創意產業知識的管理與知識資產的建置。本課程首先將定義何謂文化創意產業，其次將探討如何導入知識管理的概念架構與技術，針對所選定的文化創意產業案例及主題，做知識經營層面及知識資產的創造與應用分析。並評估文化創意產業知識管理導入的方式，與知識加值應用與評估的方法。本課程的主要目標除提供創意與互動設計研究所，知識管理的基礎理論基礎外，也將透過文化創意產業之創新案例及主題，提供同學發展知識管理實務的實務經驗。
description.en: The development of Cultural Creative Industries is nowadays becoming a fashion of innovation industrial development. This course will discuss how to manage the knowledge asset and create their values in Cultural Creative Industries from the perspective of knowledge management. This course will begin with the discussion on the definition of the Cultural Creative Industries. Then, follow the discussion on how to introduce the basic knowledge management framework and technologies to analyze, evaluate and create the values of the knowledge assets in Cultural Creative Industries. The main objective of this course will provide students practical experiences on the implementation of knowledge management in Cultural Creative Industries through various case studies in different categories.

description.zh: 嵌入式系統是一種結合電腦軟體和硬體的應用，舉凡行動電話、遊樂器、影音設備等生活配備，或者是運輸系統以及工廠生產的自動控制，隨處可見嵌入式系統的應用。    本課程主要在介紹嵌入式系統之基本原理及應用，內容包含了有計算機概論、程式語言、作業系統、電腦網路、電腦硬體、Linux程式設計、嵌入式Linux系統介紹。
description.en: Embedded system is a combinative application of computer software and hardware. It includes mobile phones, TV games, video and audio equipments, transportation system and automatic control system produced by factories, and so on.     This curriculum mainly introduces basic principles and application of embedded system. It contains Computer Introduction, Programming Language, Operating System, Computer Network, Computer Hardware, Linux Programming, and Introduction to Embedded Linux system.

name.zh: 模糊理論在災害管理之應用
name.en: Application of Fuzzy Theory in Disaster Management

description.zh: 模糊理論基本觀念模糊數學模糊多屬性決策分析應用實例分析
description.en: The course introduces fuzzy theory and related models to improve the effectiveness of disaster management. The main content includes concepts of logic, fuzzy set, fuzzy relation, fuzzy math, fuzzy logic, calculation principles, and some important performance evaluation methods and application algorithms which are often used with fuzzy theory. The course may help students not only touching the key concepts of fuzzy theory, but also independently doing deeper research in fuzzy, evaluation, and management field.

description.zh: 本課程介紹當代重要的建築思潮、事件與作品。從代謝派到流體建築的發展，每週選定一個主題說明之。
description.en: The course attempts to give an introduction to important architectural thoughts, events and projects after 1900, except for the heyday of modernism. From metabolism to blobitecture, each week a lecture referring to one specific topic including relevant materials will be given.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.
